1.content: Ok just to start this story can be about anything to do with expansion whether it BBW weight gain, expansion , magic, blue berry what ever you choose just make these students round and fat. This story has a main focus on girls but guys can join in with a Minor rule like boy freind or something with that said lets get to the characters
1.title: A little info

11.content: Eva strolled into her school taking in the sights and sounds of her new school. And to be honest it wasn't that nerve racking her 2 closest freinds had moved here almost a year ago and Eva was eager to hook up with her freinds and as she stepped off the bus to her new yearly boarding school she was greeted by the sight of her two freinds that ran in to greet her then take her over to her dorm.
11.title: Year 10 girl
